mapper.sql: id, createId, publishTime, updateTime, title, systemType, useArea, companyName, linkMan, telephone, email, province, city, area, address, cooperationType, status, is_deleted,introduce
mapper.select: select a.id,date_format(a.publishTime,'%Y-%m-%d') publishTime,date_format(a.updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d') updateTime, a.title,a.systemType,a.useArea,a.companyName,a.linkMan,a.telephone,a.email,a.province,a.city,a.area,a.address,a.cooperationType,a.status, a.introduce,a.createId,a.reason, p.name as provinceName,c.name as cityName,ar.name as areaName,con.name as systemName,co.name as useAreaName from t_e_achievement a LEFT JOIN t_dictionary_province p on a.province = p.code LEFT JOIN t_dictionary_city c on a.city = c.code LEFT JOIN t_dictionary_area ar on a.area = ar.code LEFT JOIN t_dictionary_constant con on con.code = a.systemType and con.type = 19 LEFT JOIN t_dictionary_constant co on co.code = a.useArea and co.type = 18 where a.id = #{id} and a.is_deleted = 0

select a.id,a.title,a.introduce,con.name as systemName,co.name as useAreaName,a.cooperationType, case when a.companyName is null or a.companyName = '' THEN a.companyName when a.companyName is not null and a.companyName != '' then '********' end as companyName, case when a.linkMan is null or a.linkMan = '' THEN a.linkMan when a.linkMan is not null and a.linkMan != '' then '********' end as linkMan, case when a.telephone is null or a.telephone = '' THEN a.telephone when a.telephone is not null and a.telephone != '' then '********' end as telephone, case when a.email is null or a.email = '' THEN a.email when a.email is not null and a.email != '' then '********' end as email, '***' as provinceName,'***' as cityName,'***' as areaName, case when a.address is null or a.address = '' THEN a.address when a.address is not null and a.address != '' then '********' end as address from t_e_achievement a LEFT JOIN t_dictionary_constant con on con.code = a.systemType and con.type = 19 LEFT JOIN t_dictionary_constant co on co.code = a.useArea and co.type = 18 where a.id = #{id} and a.status = 1
select a.id,a.title,date_format(a.updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d') updateTime from t_e_achievement a WHERE a.is_deleted = 0 and a.status = 1 ORDER by a.updateTime DESC limit 0,#{count}
